item.title: Plzzzzz help me with theese 2 errors
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Ok I recently added the player count on screen and got 2 errors

Errors:

client.java:8548: cannot find symbol symbol : class MessageDigest location: class client MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance( "MD5" ); ^ client.java:8548: cannot find symbol symbol : variable MessageDigest location: class client MessageDigest md = MessageDigest.getInstance( "MD5" ); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

This is what my public boolen looks like:

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms writePlayers();

This is what ermm this looks like:

[code]import java.io.;
import java.util.;
import java.text.*;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@whi@untoldlegends", 6570);
sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572);
SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat(“MMM dd hh:mm”);
String date = sdf.format(new Date());
sendFrame126("@red@" + date, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
} [/code]

I need help like right now! thanks!

[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:15:56 PM[/size][hr]help?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:35:34 PM[/size][hr]cmon…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:43:39 PM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 08:57:06 PM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 11:31:48 PM[/size][hr]i used diff tuts…soo it kinda looks diff but just give me correct way it should be
